text: Marla Gibbs (born June 14, 1931 in Chicago) is an American comedian and actress. She played Florence Johnston on The Jeffersons. Then she played Mary Jenkins on the sitcom 227. She also acts in movies. ==References== Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Television personalities from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:1931 births Category:Living people
title: Marla Gibbs
